titleStmt.title: The English Catholike Christian, or, The saints utopia: by Thomas de Eschallers de la More, an unprofitable servant of Jesus Christ: of Graies-Inne barrister, and minister of the Gospel of eternall salvation. In the yeer of grace and truth, 1640. A treatise consisting of four sections. 1 Josuah's resolution. 2 Of the common law. 3 Of physick. 4 Of divinity.
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, d. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Leybourn, in Monks-well street, and are to be sold at Graies-Inne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
